Author: Timwi
Description: Answer questions about some of the other modules on the same bomb which you already solved. Requires keeping more notes than usual. Tags: question, 4-answers, black-display
Name: Souvenir

Souvenir.Explanation: In the case where there are exactly 2 Souvenirs on the same bomb, each Souvenir could ask what module the first question on the other Souvenir was about.
